message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I think it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $14,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only do it for $8,000.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $8,000 is too low for me. Could you do $11,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my budget.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,500?
